Class MainWindow

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.example.anti_cafe.MainWindow
Direct Known Subclasses:
TableCloseWindow, TableSelectionWindow
public class MainWindow extends javafx.application.Application
Class of the application, responsible for initializing the interface and managing table statuses.
